item.title: File Path Traversal Simple Case
item.description: Lab URL : https://0ac7003b03b289fd80483a4d00050045.web-security-academy.net/ This lab objective is to read /etc/passwd file from the url we can click on view item to get the more details about the product and if we look at the url : https://0ac7003b03b289fd80483a4d00050045.web-security-academy.net/product?productId=1 but the parameter should be filename if we want to inject the payload so let’s open a image in new tab if we look at the url now : https://0ac7003b03b289fd80483a4d00050045.web-security-academy.net/image?filename=38.jpg since we have a filename as a parameter we can use .
